title: Bubbles

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bubbles found in the Chambers of Xeric indicate a fishing spot where players can fish for different kinds of fish.

content:
Bubbles
Released5 January 2017 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationChambers of Xeric
OptionsFish
ExamineSomething is stirring beneath the water.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID29889

Bubbles found in the Chambers of Xeric indicate a fishing spot where players can fish for different kinds of fish.

To catch fish, a fishing rod is required, with cave worms as bait. Scavengers drop both of these items. In resource rooms with fishing spots, there are three fishing spots. One of these three spots contains a cave snake, which will damage the player (or take their fish). If a snake appears in the fishing spot, stop fishing and click elsewhere to avoid taking damage. While the spots are static, the spots containing plain fish and the cave snake change occasionally.
